Title: Creation of bracketed-paste.vim
Description:
I start with the code from Conrad Irwin's repository and build on it to support GNU Screen and Tmux. I also avoid an issue with the Escape key. The Vim script has been extensively tested and should cause no issues in any configuration, but I might of course have missed something.

In the middle I switch to another file, which is because I moved development to my own repository and I found no way to merge Vim's undofiles.

Github: jooize/vim-bracketed-paste
